description.narrative: The Water Innovation Engine will stimulate greater innovation in the water sector, to help achieve Sustainable Development Goal 6 (SDG6) by: unleashing investment; galvanising partnerships; identifying best practice in running innovation competitions; running competitions to address priority issues, and; tracking and evaluate the impact of the investments. All potential activities will be assessed on their potential to tackle pressing water and sanitation challenges for households, cities and watersheds, with a focus on advancing the well-being of the less-advantaged populations of low- and middle-income countries. The total value of this investment is $7.9 million over 3 years, starting 2016-17.
